title: Golf at the 2018 Mediterranean Games
text:
The <a href="golf">golf</a> competitions at the <a href="2018%20Mediterranean%20Games">2018 Mediterranean Games</a> in <a href="Tarragona">Tarragona</a> took place between 25 and 28 June at the Costa Daurada Golf Club. 
Athletes competed in four events.
Medal summary.
"(a) denotes an amateur golfer"
Source:
